title: Hot cross buns!
ingredients: ['450g bread flour', '25g fresh yeast or 7 grams dried', '2 egg yolks', '100g sugar', '1/2 tsp salt', '85g unsalted butter', '170g dried fruits ...or just sultanas, soaked a little bit (before...I usually soak them in rum)', '215ml milk (or maybe a little bit more if the mix is too dry)', '1 extra egg yolk, for glazing']
